message: Bob, I'm excited to offer you this unique product that I believe will be a valuable asset to you. My starting price is $1,750,000. I'm confident that we can find a mutually beneficial agreement.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,400,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Bob, I understand your perspective, but $1,400,000 is unfortunately below my minimum acceptable price.  I'm willing to come down to $1,600,000, which still represents a fair value for this unique product. I'm confident this is a price that will benefit both of us.

I understand that you're willing to come down, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $1,520,000. I believe this is a fair compromise that benefits both of us.
